column1: '''Evgenia Hatzithanasi-Kollia''' (Greek: '''Ευγενία Χατζηθανάση-Κόλλια''') is the Greek translator of most [[J.R.R. Tolkien

Her work with Tolkien started when she found by chance an abandoned English copy of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', forgotten by a tourist. As she liked the book, she proposed to [http://www.kedros.gr/ Kedros] publishing house to make a translation and publish it in Greek. Thus the ''Lord of the Rings'' was the first fantasy book to be published in Greek.
*[[1978]]: "Ο Άρχοντας των Δαχτυλιδιών (''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'')
*"Ο Σιδεράς του Μεγάλου Γούτον" (''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]'')
*[[2007]]: "Τα παιδιά του Χούριν" (''[[The Children of Húrin]]'')
